body:
Finally

the solution

bake mesh with color to 3dsmax

1- download [rendervertexcolors.gh](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/attachment/download?id=2985220%3AUploadedFile%3A663245) from

[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/how-to-render-mesh-colors](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/forum/topics/how-to-render-mesh-colors)

2- save texture - bake result

3- exported .obj 

4- imported to 3dsmax ,and through the texture on it 

works perfectly
